scripts.test: cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=cypress/reports/html,reportFilename=mochawesome,overwrite=true,html=true,json=true || echo 'Cypress run failed, but continuing'
scripts.merge-reports: if ls cypress/reports/html/*.json 1> /dev/null 2>&1; then mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/html/*.json > cypress/reports/html/mochawesome.json; else echo '{"results":[],"stats":{}}' > cypress/reports/html/mochawesome.json; fi
scripts.generate-report: if [ -s cypress/reports/html/mochawesome.json ]; then marge cypress/reports/html/mochawesome.json -f mochawesome -o cypress/reports/html; else echo 'No merged report to generate'; fi
